solution_line_template: Rent plus utilities for the whole apartment is {rent}+{utilities} = $<<{rent}+{utilities}={rent_plus_utilities}>>{rent_plus_utilities}
If one roommate pays ${roommate_paid} in all, the total cost of everything is {roommate_paid}*{num_roommates} = <<{roommate_paid}*{num_roommates}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
